{{Big Brother endgame | hmpage = Housemates | seriesname = Big Brother Brasil | previous = Big Brother Brasil 2 | next = Big Brother Brasil 4 | series = Season 3 (2003) | image = | imagebg = #000 | start = January 14, 2003 | end = April 1, 2003 | hm1 = Dhomini | hm1-enter = Day 1 | hm1-exit = Day 78 | hm1-stat = winner | hm2 = Elane | hm2-enter = Day 1 | hm2-exit = Day 78 | hm2-stat = runner | hm3 = Viviane | hm3-enter = Day 1 | hm3-exit = Day 76 | hm3-stat = evic | hm4 = Jean | hm4-enter = Day 1 | hm4-exit = Day 71 | hm4-stat = evic | hm5 = Harry | hm5-enter = Day 13 | hm5-exit = Day 64 | hm5-stat = evic | hm6 = Sabrina | hm6-enter = Day 1 | hm6-exit = Day 57 | hm6-stat = evic | hm7 = Emilio | hm7-enter = Day 1 | hm7-exit = Day 50 | hm7-stat = evic | hm8 = Alan | hm8-enter = Day 1 | hm8-exit = Day 43 | hm8-stat = five | hm9 = Juliana | hm9-enter = Day 1 | hm9-exit = Day 36 | hm9-stat = evic | hm10 = Andrea | hm10-enter = Day 1 | hm10-exit = Day 29 | hm10-stat = evic | hm11 = Marcelo | hm11-enter = Day 1 | hm11-exit = Day 22 | hm11-stat = evic | hm12 = Joseane | hm12-enter = Day 1 | hm12-exit = Day 15 | hm12-stat = evic | hm13 = Dilson | hm13-enter = Day 1 | hm13-exit = Day 12 | hm13-stat = walk | hm14 = Paulo | hm14-enter = Day 1 | hm14-exit = Day 8 | hm14-stat = evic | hm15 = Samantha | hm15-enter = Day 1 | hm15-exit = Day 8 | hm15-stat = evic | legendwinner = Winner | legendrunner = Runner Up | legendevic = Evicted | legend5 = Big Boss Winner }} '''''Big Brother Brasil 3''''' was the third season of '''''Big Brother Brasil''''' which premiered January 14, 2003 with the season finale airing April 1, 2003 on the [[Rede Globo]] [[television network]]. The show was produced by [[Endemol|Endemol Globo]] and presented by news reporter [[Pedro Bial]] and directed by Jose Bonifacio Brasil de Oliveira. The prize award was R$500,000 without tax allowances. The winner was 31 year-old congressional aide AndrÃ© "Dhomini" Ferreira from [[GoiÃ¢nia]], [[GoiÃ¡s]] [http://www.terra.com.br/exclusivo/bbb3/2003/04/01/004.htm Dhomini vence o Big Brother Brasil 3] ==Overview== There were fourteen Housemates competing for the grand prize, an increase over the two previous seasons. The season lasted 78 days, an increase of one week over the previous season. This season introduced the "Angel Power" or "Power of Immunity". ===Controversy=== Among the contestants was the [[Miss Brasil|Miss Brasil 2002]], Joseane Oliveira. Rules of the Miss Brasil contest forbid participation of married women, and when Joseane participated, she stated she was single. Due to the overexposition in the BBB, some magazines discovered she was married since before winning the beauty contest. The marriage being proved, Joseane was stripped of her crown, and Thaisa Tomsem was crowned Miss Brasil 2002. Also, contestant Dilson, not knowing Joseane was married, tried to start a romantic relationship with her during the show. Due to her refusals, he felt unmotivated and left the show voluntairly. Harry replaced him at January 26, and became the first contestant not to enter the show at the first day. ===Reunion Show=== The reunion was hosted by [[Pedro Bial]] and aired on April 6, 2003. All the former housemates, except Dilson, attended. Alan ended up winning the "Big Boss Prize" which awarded R$50,000. He won over Andrea with 70% of the fans' vote.[http://bbb.globo.com/BBB3/0,6993,BNP517525-2526,00.html Alan derrota Andrea e leva R$ 50 mil para casa ] ===After the Show=== [[Sabrina Sato]] became a personality on the country. She hosts a popular comedy show "Panico na Tv" which premiered in 2003 and has a big audiencie at channel [[Rede TV!]]. Juliana Alves starred in some [[Rede Globo]]'s prime-time soaps operas in 2007 entitled "[[Duas Caras]]" and in 2009 another called "[[Caminho das Ãndias]]". Both are one of the biggest celebrities coming out of the show. ==Housemates== (ages stated at time of contest) {| class="wikitable" |- ! Name ! Age ! Occupation ! Hometown |- | Alan Cavalcante | 26 | Basketball Player | {{Flagicon|Rio de Janeiro}} [[Rio de Janeiro]] |- | Andrea Guerrero | 39 | Advertising | {{Flagicon|SÃ£o Paulo}} [[SÃ£o Paulo]] |- | Dilson Walkarez | 30 | Biker | {{Flagicon|Mato Grosso do Sul}} [[Campo Grande]] |- | AndrÃ© "Dhomini" Ferreira | 31 | Congressional Aide | {{Flagicon|GoiÃ¡s}} [[GoiÃ¢nia]] |- | Elane Silva | 18 | Teacher | {{Flagicon|Bahia}} [[ItanhÃ©m]] |- | EmÃ­lio Zagaia | 30 | Diver | {{Flagicon|ParanÃ¡}} [[Londrina]] |- | Harry Grossman | 34 | Guidebook | {{Flagicon|Rio de Janeiro}} [[TeresÃ³polis]] |- | Jean Massumi | 28 | Massage Therapist | {{Flagicon|SÃ£o Paulo}} [[SÃ£o Paulo]] |- | Joseane Oliveira | 22 | Former [[Miss Brasil|Miss Brasil 2002]] | {{Flagicon|Rio Grande do Sul}} [[Canoas]] |- | Juliana Alves | 21 | Student | {{Flagicon|Rio de Janeiro}} [[Rio de Janeiro]] |- | Marcelo Kretzer | 22 | Disc Jockey | {{Flagicon|Santa Catarina}} [[Blumenau]] |- | Paulo Carotini | 33 | Photographer | {{Flagicon|SÃ£o Paulo}} [[SÃ£o Paulo]] |- | [[Sabrina Sato]] | 22 | Student | {{Flagicon|SÃ£o Paulo}} [[PenÃ¡polis]] |- | Samantha Pereira | 28 | Personal Trainer | {{Flagicon|Rio de Janeiro}} [[Rio de Janeiro]] |- | Viviane Oliveira | 28 | Lawyer | {{Flagicon|SÃ£o Paulo}} [[Votorantim]] |} ==Voting History== The voting table below records whom each housemate voted to nominate on the diary room during his or her time in the House. The Head of Household vote (casted in front of the other housemates) automatically nominate one housemate from eviction. Then, the other housemates voting and if the vote is tied, the HOH breaks the tie (all this types of vote count for the total number of nominations received). {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:center; width: 99%; font-size:87%; line-height:15px;" |- ! rowspan=2| ! colspan=2| Week 1 ! rowspan=2| Week 2 ! rowspan=2| Week 3 ! rowspan=2| Week 4 ! rowspan=2| Week 5 ! rowspan=2| Week 6 ! rowspan=2| Week 7 ! rowspan=2| Week 8 ! rowspan=2| Week 9 ! rowspan=2| Week 10 ! colspan=2| Week 11 ! rowspan=2| Nominations

to win |} * [[#fn1|Note 1:]] At the first round of nominations there were two separate rounds of nominations - one in which males nominated the females, and one in which the females nominated the males. On Day 8 there was a double eviction - with the female and male evictees leaving the House. This Week's HoH Elane could only exercise her powers during the male Nominations round. ==References== {{Reflist|2}} ==External links== ;Official * [http://bbb3.globo.com/ Big Brother Brasil 3] ;Other * [http://www.terra.com.br/exclusivo/bbb3/ Terra: BBB3] {{Big Brother Brasil}} [[Category:2003 television seasons]] [[Category:Big Brother Brasil]] [[Category:Big Brother seasons]] [[es:Big Brother (Brasil)]] [[pt:Big Brother Brasil]]
